Class ActionParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.comphenix.xp.parser.ConfigurationParser<Action>

  • public class ActionParser
extends ConfigurationParser<Action>
    Represents a parser that will convert item configuration sections into action objects.

    Kristian

        public Action parse(org.bukkit.configuration.ConfigurationSection input,
           java.lang.String key)
             throws ParsingException
        Description copied from class: ConfigurationParser
        Transforms a configuration object, represented by a key, into an object.
        Specified by:
        parse in class ConfigurationParser<Action>
        Parameters:
        input - - the configuration section in which the object is stored.
        key - - the key of the configuration object.
        Returns:
        A transformed object, or NULL if the input is empty.
        Throws:
        ParsingException - An error occurred during the parsing.
